elimination.translation[0].definitions[0: the removal or destruction of something
the elimination of lead in petrol
elimination.translation[0].definitions[1: the defeat of a team or player in a competition, so that they may no longer take part
elimination.translation[0].definitions[2: the act of killing someone, especially to prevent them from causing trouble
The killings are part of a campaign of elimination of the political opposition.
elimination.translation[0].definitions[3: the process of getting rid of substances that your body no longer needs
the elimination of toxins from the body
